sen.j: 承保2年（1075年）から始まった法勝寺の造営に当たってはその導師を務め、承暦元年（1077年）の落慶供養の際にはその権別当に就任した。
sen.e: At the time of the construction of the Hossho-ji Temple which was begun in 1075, he was put in charge of its doshi (officiating monk), and at the time of its hoyo (a memorial service to celebrate the construction of a temple) in 1077 he was assigned to the gon no betto (acting chief).

sen.e: He was relied on heavily by the Emperor Gosanjo and the next Emperor Shirakawa, and was consulted about various matters in both religious and civil areas.
